item.title: By: Mantees
item.dc:creator: Mantees
item.description:
AFAIK another patch, only server side and thus not numbered has been released the 23th:
* Khorium has been added back into the game. * Lady Palanseer in the Hall of Legends and Captain Dirgehammer in the Champion's Hall have returned and are now selling level 70 PvP rewards. * The drop rate of Draenei Prayer Beads for the quest "Digging for Prayer Beads" has been increased. * Fixed an issue where players were not getting rested experience in Shattrath on select realms. * Reduced the respawn time of the Zangarmarsh quest targets: Boglash, Lord Klaq, and Blacksting
item.content:encoded:
AFAIK another patch, only server side and thus not numbered has been released the 23th:

* Khorium has been added back into the game.
* Lady Palanseer in the Hall of Legends and Captain Dirgehammer in the Champion’s Hall have returned and are now selling level 70 PvP rewards.
* The drop rate of Draenei Prayer Beads for the quest “Digging for Prayer Beads” has been increased.
* Fixed an issue where players were not getting rested experience in Shattrath on select realms.
* Reduced the respawn time of the Zangarmarsh quest targets: Boglash, Lord Klaq, and Blacksting

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description:
This patch means nothing in pvp, believe me :/ .. I still hate being 3 shotted by a hunter who is actually still on the move. This is about endgame pve dmg, they are bringing hunters, mages and the godly shadowpriest back into line, which I might add is just under the Rogue dps :P
Oh and Cloak of shadows kicks ass.
item.content:encoded:
This patch means nothing in pvp, believe me :/ .. I still hate being 3 shotted by a hunter who is actually still on the move. This is about endgame pve dmg, they are bringing hunters, mages and the godly shadowpriest back into line, which I might add is just under the Rogue dps üòõ

Oh and Cloak of shadows kicks ass.

item.title: By: steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
"* The bonus coefficient for 'Shadow Word: Pain' has been reduced by about 9%. This should result in about 5% less damage done by 'Shadow Word: Pain'¬ù for the typical priest."
But for your non-typical face melter, you still will be able to melt the hell out of anyones face, with an added 99% chance to aggravate them in the process as well.
item.content:encoded:
“* The bonus coefficient for ‘Shadow Word: Pain’ has been reduced by about 9%. This should result in about 5% less damage done by ‘Shadow Word: Pain’¬ù for the typical priest.”

But for your non-typical face melter, you still will be able to melt the hell out of anyones face, with an added 99% chance to aggravate them in the process as well.

item.title: By: Tami "Cuppycake"
item.dc:creator: Tami "Cuppycake"
item.description: Aww man, why the priest nerf? We weren't *that* overpowered.
item.content:encoded: Aww man, why the priest nerf? We weren’t *that* overpowered.

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description: I wonder if this will fix the +62000 Stamina +51000 Fire Resistance (plus or minus a few thousand) plate shoulders a guildy was advertising last night.
item.content:encoded: I wonder if this will fix the +62000 Stamina +51000 Fire Resistance (plus or minus a few thousand) plate shoulders a guildy was advertising last night.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: Well I guess it's a good thing my pet does most of my damage for me (go go big red killing machine), the Arcane Shot and ranged attack reduction sucks.
item.content:encoded: Well I guess it’s a good thing my pet does most of my damage for me (go go big red killing machine), the Arcane Shot and ranged attack reduction sucks.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Haha, I've seen it. It's umm, interesting. Very interesting.
Elbows - Ya, we're going to have a few arena teams going. We spent some time pre-BC mapping out our formula for the Perfect Arena Team of Pwnage and, yes, it involves rogues.
item.content:encoded:
Haha, I’ve seen it. It’s umm, interesting. Very interesting.

Elbows – Ya, we’re going to have a few arena teams going. We spent some time pre-BC mapping out our formula for the Perfect Arena Team of Pwnage and, yes, it involves rogues.

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Man, they need to nerf the Blood Elf female stealth animation. It's awesome.
Do yourself a favor and make one and get her to level 2 just to see it.
(HINT: It involves being shorter then a gnome when stealthed standing still)
item.content:encoded:
Man, they need to nerf the Blood Elf female stealth animation. It’s awesome.

Do yourself a favor and make one and get her to level 2 just to see it.

(HINT: It involves being shorter then a gnome when stealthed standing still)

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Enjoy it while it lasts Foton.
On a less bitter note, do you have COS yet? Planning on doing any arena? Wound posion omfg?
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy it while it lasts Foton.

On a less bitter note, do you have COS yet? Planning on doing any arena? Wound posion omfg?
